verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them that stand <S%G2476><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> they have seen <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> taketh <S%G3880><s%> with him Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> leadeth them up <S%G399><s%> <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a high <S%G5308><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> apart by themselves: <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G3441><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he was transfigured <S%G3339><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> raiment <S%G2440><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> shining, <S%G4744><s%> exceeding <S%G3029><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> snow; <S%G5510><s%> so as <S%G3634><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fuller <S%G1102><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> white <S%G3021><s%> them.

And <S%G2532><s%> there appeared <S%G3700><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Moses: <S%G3475><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> talking with <S%G4814><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G4461><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> for us <S%G2248><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> here: <S%G5602><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let us make <S%G4160><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> tabernacles; <S%G4633><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> for thee, <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> for Moses, <S%G3475><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> for Elijah. <S%G2243><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> he wist <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> to say; <S%G2980><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> sore afraid. <S%G1630><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> that overshadowed <S%G1982><s%> them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cloud, <S%G3507><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son: <S%G5207><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> suddenly, <S%G1819><s%> when they had looked round about, <S%G4017><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> any more, <S%G3765><s%> save <S%G235><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> came down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> he charged <S%G1291><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G1334><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> what things <S%G3739><s%> they had seen, <S%G1492><s%> till <S%G1508><s%> <S%G3752><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> were risen <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they kept <S%G2902><s%> that saying <S%G3056><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> questioning one with another <S%G4802><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rising <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> should mean. <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and told <S%G2036><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and restoreth <S%G600><s%> all things; <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he must suffer <S%G3958><s%> many things, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be set at naught. <S%G1847><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> is indeed <S%G2532><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they have done <S%G4160><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> they listed, <S%G2309><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> questioning <S%G4802><s%> with them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people, <S%G3793><s%> when they beheld <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> were greatly amazed, <S%G1568><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> running to him <S%G4370><s%> saluted <S%G782><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> scribes, <S%G1122><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> question <S%G4802><s%> ye with <S%G4314><s%> them? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> I have brought <S%G5342><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> which hath <S%G2192><s%> a dumb <S%G216><s%> spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> wheresoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> he taketh <S%G2638><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he teareth <S%G4486><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he foameth, <S%G875><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnasheth <S%G5149><s%> with his <S%G848><s%> teeth, <S%G3599><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pineth away: <S%G3583><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I spake <S%G2036><s%> to thy <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should cast him out; <S%G1544><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they could <S%G2480><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> thou canst <S%G1410><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are possible <S%G1415><s%> to him that believeth. <S%G4100><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> came running together, <S%G1998><s%> he rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> foul <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Thou dumb <S%G216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> deaf <S%G2974><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> charge <S%G2004><s%> thee, <S%G4671><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> no more <S%G3371><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the spirit cried, <S%G2896><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rent <S%G4682><s%> him <S%G846><s%> sore, <S%G4183><s%> and came out <S%G1831><s%> of him: and <S%G2532><s%> he was <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> one dead; <S%G3498><s%> insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> He is dead. <S%G599><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2902><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by the <S%G3588><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and lifted him up; <S%G1453><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he arose. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house, <S%G3624><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> privately, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> Why <S%G3754><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> cast him out? <S%G1544><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they departed <S%G1831><s%> thence, <S%G1564><s%> and passed <S%G3899><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> should know <S%G1097><s%> it.

But <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> understood <S%G50><s%> not that saying, <S%G4487><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were afraid <S%G5399><s%> to ask <S%G1905><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum: <S%G2584><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> was it that ye disputed <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way? <S%G3598><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he sat down, <S%G2523><s%> and called <S%G5455><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> If any man <S%G1536><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> the same shall be <S%G2071><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> of all, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> servant <S%G1249><s%> of all. <S%G3956><s%>
